title: Spongeweb
description:
I really like hacking.
I really like privacy.
And I really like spongebob.
I combined all of them and created an anonymous sharing platform with html support. Feel free to share payloads, malware and stolen credit cards ;). Btw it's called spongeweb but it has nothing to do with [this](https://trollpasta.com/wiki/SpongeWeb). Site: [http://spongeweb.challs.srdnlen.it](http://spongeweb.challs.srdnlen.it) Author: [@sanmatte](https://github.com/sanmatte)
